Package org.smartfrog.sfcore.utils

Interface Summary
Executable An execution interface.
ShouldDetachOrTerminate these attributes are used by components that want to have workflow semantics The actual fetching and interpretation is handled in ComponentHelper.sfSelfDetachAndOrTerminate(String, String, org.smartfrog.sfcore.reference.Reference, Throwable)
 

Class Summary
CDPrinter This class provides a single static method - print - which takes a ComponentDescription and iterates over it to generate an output string.
ComponentHelper Contains methods for helping components; a factoring out of common functionality.
ListUtils List utility functions
ParentHelper Contains all the child-minding logic for anything that wants to host children
PlatformHelper Repository of file and path values for the local and different platforms.
ResourceLoader This is something that can hand off resource loading to whatever does loading.
ReverseListIterator<Type> An iterator to walk backwards through a list
SerializableEnumeration<T> A serializable enumeration.
SerializableIterator<T> This is a special iterator that is designed to be serializable; you can send it over the wire and it does not complain.
SFExpandFully This class lets you expand out a complete .sf file to a new file; takes a source and a dest.
SmartFrogThread This thread represents the base class for threads run under SmartFrog.
Spinner Utility class to spin and timeout.
TimeoutInterval Simple wrapper class to track timeout intervals; this code gets used often enough that a single place for it eliminates duplication.
WorkerThreadPrimImpl Created 24-Feb-2009 14:49:27 - originally in the Hadoop package, but moved to the core for re-use
WorkflowThread The Workflow thread will terminate its owner when finishing.
WrappedInstance<T> This is a class for wrapping up non-remotable state to the SmartFrog context, and is used to attach in-JVM interfaces to the SF graph in a way that allows components in the same JVM to get the value, and the management console to see that it is present and the string description.
 

Exception Summary
TimedOutIOException An exception for an IO operation that timed out
